snippet.title: Yellow Taxi Goes Vroom Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Jump behind the wheel of a vibrant yellow taxi in Yellow Taxi Goes Vroom, an arcade platformer with no jump button. "Ride to the top of hills, trees, houses, and people before the clock runs out, and meet a colorful cast of weirdos in this nostalgia-infused road trip." https://store.steampowered.com/app/2011780/Yellow_Taxi_Goes_Vroom/ #indiegames #gaming #cozygames
